result.eng: It's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás

result.html: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.html: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.

result.eng: I regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ga: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh

result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua dom naċ ḃfaca mé an dráma riaṁI regret very much that I never saw the play.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
